display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (NREM): (Apneas with >= 3% oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with >= 3% oxygen desaturation used and with or without arousal) / hours of NREM sleep from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-rapid eye movement sleep (NREM) associated with >= 3% desaturation) / (hours of non-rapid eye movement sleep (NREM))]
calculation: 60*(hnrbp3 + hnrop3 + canbp3 + canop3 + oanbp3 + oanop3 + manrbp3 + manrop3) / (slpprdp - minremp)
